item.title: EP 48 - Crazy Cryptid Week: The Grootslang
item.itunes:title: Crazy Cryptid Week: The Grootslang
item.description:
Today we look directly into the sun! And then journey into the deepest caverns in Africa in search of the Grootslang.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Sungazing is the belief that you don't need to eat. Or drink. All you need is to look at the sun for 45 minutes a day and all other things will become unnecessary. Except for a seeing eye dog.

Then we go to Africa to meet the Grootslang! It's the first day of our Cryptid Week and today we examine the myth, and possible reality, of a monstrous half-elephant/half-snake. And you thought Bigfoot was scary!

Sungazing: We Can’t Make This Stuff Up

http://www.sciencebadger.com/sungazing-cant-make-stuff/

How long does it take before your eyes get damaged when looking at the sun?

https://scienceline.ucsb.edu/getkey.php?key=3269

How to practice sungazing to improve your health

https://www.kawoq.org/practice-sun-gazing-get-benefits/

The Health Benefits of Sungazing

https://www.globalhealingcenter.com/natural-health/health-benefits-of-sungazing/

Have You Heard Of Sun Gazing? Find Out What It Is And How To Do It!

https://www.collective-evolution.com/2014/07/10/sun-gazing-why-you-should-be-doing-it/

“Eat the Sun”: Sun-worshiping fantasy versus reality

http://scienceblogs.com/insolence/2012/04/27/eat-the-sun-sun-worshiping-fantasy-versu/

The Grootslang

http://monstersvault.com/vaults/grootslang-south-africa/

The Grootslang

http://new-cryptozoology.wikia.com/wiki/Grootslang

The Grootslang: Guardian Of The Treasure

https://verybizarrestories.wordpress.com/2017/09/24/the-grootslang-guardian-of-the-treasure/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
